alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:28AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington and northeastern Douglas Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Flanagan Lake, or 3 miles south of Bennington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benson around 435 AM CDT. Omaha and Fort Calhoun around 440 AM CDT. Carter Lake, Florence and Eppley Airfield around 445 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
